mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_article(article_pic, article_name, article_tag, article_type, article_state, top_state, publish_id, create_time, update_time, article_read_count, article_star_num, article_comment_num, article_remark, article_content) VALUES (#{articlePic}, #{articleName}, #{articleTag}, #{articleType}, #{articleState}, #{topState}, #{publishId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{articleReadCount}, #{articleStarNum}, #{articleCommentNum}, #{articleRemark}, #{articleContent})
INSERT INTO ip_address(article_id, address, create_time) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{address}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_article SET article_pic=#{articlePic}, article_name=#{articleName}, article_tag=#{articleTag}, article_type=#{articleType}, article_state=#{articleState}, top_state=#{topState}, publish_id=#{publishId}, create_time=#{createTime}, update_time=#{updateTime}, article_read_count=#{articleReadCount}, article_star_num=#{articleStarNum}, article_comment_num=#{articleCommentNum}, article_remark=#{articleRemark}, article_content=#{articleContent} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM tb_article WHERE id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ta.*, tat.type_name articleTypeName FROM tb_article ta LEFT JOIN tb_article_type tat ON ta.article_type = tat.id WHERE ta.id = #{id}

SELECT ta.article_type articleTypeId, tat.type_name articleTypeName, COUNT(ta.article_type) articleTypeCount FROM tb_article ta JOIN tb_article_type tat ON ta.article_type = tat.id WHERE ta.article_state = 1 GROUP BY ta.article_type
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y年%m月') time, COUNT(id) articleCount FROM tb_article WHERE article_state = 1 GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT ta.id, ta.article_name FROM tb_article ta WHERE ta.article_state = 1 AND ta.article_tag = (SELECT article_tag FROM tb_article taa WHERE taa.id = #{articleId}) AND ta.id != #{articleId}
SELECT * FROM tb_article WHERE article_state = 1 AND article_type = #{articleTypeId}

SELECT id, article_name, YEAR(create_time) 'year', MONTH(create_time) 'month', DAY(create_time) 'day', DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y年%m月') time FROM tb_article
AND article_state = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y年%m月') =#{time}
ORDER BY year DESC, month DESC, day DESC

SELECT COUNT(ta.id) articleCount, tat.type_name articleTypeName FROM tb_article ta JOIN tb_article_type tat ON ta.article_type = tat.id GROUP BY ta.article_type ORDER BY articleCount DESC LIMIT #{topCount}
